content.rendered: A bush lodge built on the edge of the Nobility Gorge, Gorges Lodge boasts iconic views of the Zambezi River below. Choose between a luxury thatched chalet or tented suite set in lush indigenous gardens both with sheltered private verandas. Explore local wildlife and culture on expertly guided tours, then unwind from the day while you sip on sundowners as the African sun dips below the horizon.
